snippet.title: 5  Shift Left with a Strong Definition of Done
snippet.description:
🔍 Shift Left with a Strong Definition of Done
🎥 Episode 5 of 10 — Just Released

“Patching defects at the end? It’s already too late.”
If you're catching bugs during UAT or after release—
⏳ You’ve already lost time.
💸 You’ve already lost money.
😬 And you're risking your reputation.

Here’s the truth:

Most late-stage defects could’ve been caught way earlier.
That’s why at NKD Agility, we help teams shift left—
✅ Strengthen your Definition of Done
✅ Embed early quality checks
✅ Integrate security and telemetry before you go live

Because when you move quality to the front of the process:
🔥 You stop firefighting at the back
💡 You build trust in your increments
📈 You save time, save face, and deliver real value

Need fewer production surprises? Visit https://www.nkdagility.com

👇 Tap to watch now. Follow for the full 10-part series.
#ShiftLeft #AgileQuality #DefinitionOfDone #DevOps #EngineeringExcellence #SoftwareTesting #NKDAgility #MartinHinshelwood #RedefiningDone #CatchBugsEarly
